metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7928 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger a read overrun and access arbitrary memory by issuing specially crafted queries. This issue affects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v4.4 versions prior to 4.4.1; v4.2 versions prior to 4.2.9; v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.20; v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.20.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
